entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9, Android: AOT compiler currently fails with an assertion #94880
    9.0.0
  • Obtaining a Span<Base> out of an array of Derived reference type #94874
  • Improve Unix Console.WriteLine by borrowing from PowerShell's ReadLineFromConsole #94860
  • Asserts in ILLink analyzer #94858
  • SIGSEGV in System.Numerics.Vectors #94856
    9.0.0
  • AES-GCM is supported for `net8.0` TFM but not for `net8.0-maccatalyst` TFM #94848
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected NullReferenceException when running application on Linux #94847
  • GcMemoryInfo returns incorrect values in .NET 8 on macOS 14 Sonoma #94846
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE for SslStream on Windows #94843
    Future
  • [.NET 8][iOS] AOT compiler exited with code 134 #94841
    8.0.x
  • LibraryImport generator can't generate correct syntax for ref struct #94840
    9.0.0
  • Configuration binder generator creates namespace ambiguity error #94836
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Possibility to check if a return value needs to be disposed. #94832
  • [.NET 8] <PublishTrimmed> no longers works but throws build process for an infinite loop #94831
    8.0.x
  • Type.GetType of invalid type fails AOT compilation #94830
  • HTTP client metrics: url.scheme should be opt-in, server.port should be required #94829
  • [8.0] Failing to build native components #94823
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #94821
  • [wasm] Unhandled `System.PlatformNotSupportedException` for crypto tests #94820

Closed

  • CS0122: 'ProblemDetailsJsonConverter' is inaccessible due to its protection level in code generated by System.Tex.Json.SourceGenerator #94862
  • Incorrect SYSLIB1102 error #94826
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 JsonArray.Add throws System.InvalidOperationException: "The element cannot be an object or array." #94842
    8.0.x
  • cannot import X509Certificate from file in .net core 2.0 #23763
    Future
  • DateTime.ParseExact - message text in FormatException does not include string argument #94837
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle failing in CI #89842
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64 [Load/Store]Vector64 and [Load/Store]Vector128 for 2,3 and 4 variants #84510
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #76478
    9.0.0
  • console redirection is broken #22314
    9.0.0
  • .NET on wasm has HttpClient issues on small screens #92999
    8.0.0
  • ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled failing with NativeAOT #74620
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT completely broken on 8.0 branch #93900
  • ILC and ILLink don't respect TrimmerSingleWarn in some cases #94799
  • VS 17.8 MS testhost.exe crashing on .NET 8 with Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #94770
  • [Mono] Enable more WASM AOT tests to run with WASMStripIL=true #90233
    9.0.0
  • Console.CancelKeyPress is not called when SIGQUIT is received #64969
    Future
  • [wasi] Native crash in `System.Collections.Tests` - `out of bounds memory access` #82043
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] `System.Collections.Tests` failing with an assertion, and `System.BadImageFormatException : Bad method token 0x1b00008f` #81736
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Wasi.Build.Tests - windows failures #82515
    Future
  • [wasi] `System.Collections.Tests` failing with `lock-free-alloc.c:374, condition 'next < LOCK_FREE_ALLOC_SB_USABLE_SIZE (desc->block_size) / desc->slot_size' not met` #81911
    9.0.0
  • SA1021: Negative sign should be preceded by a space #94827
  • Assertion failed '(fgPgoSource != ICorJitInfo::PgoSource::Dynamic) && "Unexpected stale profile in dynamic PGO data"' #94822

PullRequests

Created

  • Update windows queue to vs2022preview #94886
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix cross-block local assertion prop bug; add range enable #94885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94882
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version" #94878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • We already have cross-compilers etc for musl and win-arm64. Actually use them #94876
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't put any modifiers after ref #94875
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update HttpClientBuilderExtensions.cs #94869
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ;$(NetCoreAppPrevious) to src/Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.… #94867
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94865
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #94861
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SslStream test keylogfile creation #94859
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94857
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.x
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread #94855
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix a typo in jitconfigvalues.h comment #94849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Count16BitElements() intrinsic for SVE #94845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle platform not supported during test discovery. #94844
    area-System.Security
  • Disallow arrays of System.Void #94835
    breaking-change, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtables for EEClassHash and InstMethodHashTable #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Control flow refactor for `TryMoveNext` in `CompositeFormat` #94824
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94854
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix the configuration source gen diagnostic message #94881
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Downgrade 6 & 7 per tactics #94863
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94747
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #94817
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.26
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #94818
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.15
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #94819
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 8.0.1
  • Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94798
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Remove exclusion for a test that seems to work #94756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • bump-chrome-version.yml: don't run on forks #94834
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix build issues with clang18 #94782
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix format.sh script and remove dotnet-format tool from dotnet-tools.json #94839
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable disabled HTTP3 ALPN check #94838
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #94746
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix declaration of DiagAddNewRegion #94759
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Improve mono_aot_can_specialize (). #94642
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Update official windows queue to vs preview to match public #94887
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed setting ReadMode to Message for NamedPipeClientStream on Windows #94742
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable dprintf logging for the whole GC #94816
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • UnzipEven() and Count16BitElements() intrinsics for Arm64 SVE #94765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94707
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94748
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the overwritten of reg21 when `pLookup->sizeOffset >2047` #94766
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Extract common CodeAnalysis rules into separate file #94696
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add empty SVE API for Arm64 #94791
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
